Welcome to Sensory Glove’s new home! Here we will post updates on whats going on with our project. You can checkout our day to day activities on the Task List tab. Find about the people working on the project and their duties on the People Tab or read up a little bit about the project on the About Tab. Check back often to see the latest developments.
